title: Chapter 4: Customers' cooperation key to Flex's 2030 sustainability strategy - Compliance Week
summary: Flex aims to drive sustainability by reducing Scope 3 emissions on the customer side, targeting customers with science-based targets by 2025.
green_innovation: FALSE, This text describes sustainability efforts and emission reductions but does not explicitly mention innovations that contribute to environmental sustainability goals.

green_process: FALSE, The text discusses efforts to reduce emissions and implement sustainability targets but does not provide details about specific green processes in manufacturing or operational activities.
